remarks: Multiplication by a constant preserves measurability.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Jun-2014.)
statement:
mbfmulc2re.1 $e |- ( ph -> F e. MblFn ) $.
mbfmulc2re.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. RR ) $.
mbfmulc2lem.3 $e |- ( ph -> F : A --> RR ) $.
mbfmulc2lem $p |- ( ph -> ( ( A X. { B } ) oF x. F ) e. MblFn ) $.
